Description: You succumb to darkness and transport yourself into a creature's shadow. Immediately teleport to a point in range and make a melee attack on a creature. On hit, you steal all positive stat changes affecting the creature and deal ghost damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 6d8 at level 10, and 6d12 at level 17.
